评论概述: If I could leave zero stars I would!!
评论详情: I ordered this product October 9th, It is now November 3rd and it's just showing up. Even though it was listed on prime as two-day shipping. I contacted the company on Instagram no response. I contacted Amazon multiple times and they could not give me an answer why this didn't ship.  Now that the shirt is finally here I opened it up and it smells horrible.  Despite that I thought I would try it on because maybe washing will fix the smell. Washing will not fix the issues with the shirt. I bought a size large ( my normal size is l) which is actually a size smaller than what their size chart states I should have bought. I could have sized to a Medium. But a L is short so if you raise your arms you're going to see your stomach but also the way it sewn makes the underarm too big so the shirt doesn't sit right.  I'll be returning it and I hope I can save you some hassle.

评论概述: It's a bit short, but works
评论详情: If you have a belly, this shirt might be problematic as it's rather short around the midriff. I managed to keep it tucked in, but if I had a larger belly, it would have been challenging to keep it tucked. The fabric also wrinkles easily. But if you are stretching it to tuck it, the wrinkles get smoothed away. If not tucking it in, it may look wrinkled. Otherwise, it's a nice-looking shirt and I enjoyed wearing it to a concert with black jeans.
